authors: Pelletier, Dale [Oak Ridge National Lab. (ORNL), Oak Ridge, TN (United States)] (ORCID:0000000243217918)
description: This narrative was used for a draft genome of a Larkinella species. This genus contains 9 identified species, of which only 5 have genome sequence data. This specimen was collected from a root sample of an eastern cottonwood (Populus deltoides) from a field site in Bellville, Georgia.
research_orgs: Oak Ridge National Lab. (ORNL), Oak Ridge, TN (United States)
U.S. Department of Energy Systems Biology Knowledgebase
sponsor_orgs: USDOE Office of Science (SC), Biological and Environmental Research (BER)
title: Draft Genome Sequence of Larkinella sp. Strain BK230, Isolated from Populus deltoides Roots
